participant_1.background:
I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again.
I have been working at my current job for three years, but my heart is still in the outdoors.
my husband is a pastor.
I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.
i hate flowers.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are Grandparents.com, Livestrong, and Racquetball Magazine.
i hate the taste of fish.
my favorite artist was prince.
i work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman.
I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing great! I have a baby shower to go to tomorrow.
Oh fun! What are your favorite baby shower games?
I love the pin the diaper on the baby game.
That is a classic! I also love the guessing how much the baby will weigh game.
Me too! I also love opening presents.
Me too! Do you have any fun baby shower stories?
Yes! I once went to a baby shower where the mom to be had a chocolate fountain and everyone got to dip strawberries in it.
That sounds delicious! I love chocolate!
Me too! I am going to have to get some chocolate now.
Me too! Maybe we can go together?
